author: alexandair
body:
https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/demos/1-PowerShellGet.ps1

If we won't use the name "Open PowerShell" anymore, it doesn't make sense to use it as a tag on PowerShell Gallery.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: @bmanikm can you please make it 'PowerShell on Linux' instead?

title: "Open PowerShell" tag
